briefTitle: Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Indacaterol in Patients With Moderate-to-severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
officialTitle: A 26-week Extension to a 26-week Treatment, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Adaptive, Seamless, Parallel-group Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Two Doses of Indacaterol (150 and 300 µg o.d.) in Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
summary: This study evaluated the 1 year safety, tolerability and efficacy of indacaterol against placebo in the treatment of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) patients

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Participants With a Clinically Notable Pulse Rate During 52 Weeks of Treatment With Indacaterol 150 µg or 300 µg Compared to Placebo
